description.narrative: The mission of ELiDA is an organisation founded and led by women of Ethiopia to contribute its part in poverty reduction endeavors of country strategy and to alleviate unemployment/under employment problems of youths, destitute women, rural girls, OVCs, and children with disabilities in Ethiopia under the organizations integrated development programs through the application of innovative integrated development interventions in the thematic areas of Girls Education and training, Health ,Water and sanitation, environment, Livelihood (Micro financing and viable economic strengthening activities), HIV/AIDS prevention, Care and Support programs for the front line victims of the community with special focus on women, Youth/Girls and Children under difficult circumstances.

participating-org.narrative: Empathy for Life Integrated Development Association (ELIDA)

transaction.ref: Empathy for Life - Small Grants Programme
